statements: DELETE FROM iot_devices WHERE stock_level > 100 AND serial_number = 'ABC123';
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_id = 10 AND stock_level <= 5;
DELETE FROM locations WHERE location_id = 100 AND device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE serial_number LIKE 'ABC%');
DELETE FROM device_specifications WHERE device_id = 5 AND specification_name = 'Color';
DELETE FROM stock_levels WHERE id = 100 AND device_name = 'Router';
DELETE FROM device_specifications WHERE device_id = 200 AND specification_name = 'Color';
DELETE FROM serial_numbers WHERE manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01' AND is_active = FALSE;
DELETE FROM device_specifications WHERE model_name = 'iPhone' AND manufacturer = 'Apple';
